name: Mayur Rokade
body:
### MAYUR ROKADE
```
B.Tech IIT Roorkee(2012)
Mobile: +91-7738435611
E-Mail: mayurzenith@gmail.com
Github: https://github.com/mayuroks
Website: http://mayurrokade.com
```
### OBJECTIVE

Seeking a position, where I can utilize my skills while being flexible, resourceful and innovative, to learn and grow with the organization.

###Technical Skills

* **Computer Languages ~ #** C++,Java, Javascript, jQuery, SQL, HTML, CSS3, PHP
* **Operating Systems ~#** Linux, Windows
* **Platforms ~#** Android, Linux, Joomla 2.5, Twitter Bootstrap 2
* **Software Packages ~#**: Backtrack 5(Penetration Suite), Eclipse, Adobe Photoshop CS5, Adobe DreamWeaver CS6 ,Sony Vegas 9
* **Relevant Courses Taken ~#** Data Structures, Algorithms, Computer Networks, Database Management Systems, Intrusion Detection Systems

###Extra-Curriculars

**Garland Wars (IIT Saharanpur 2011)-A strategy-based gaming event.**

Won 1st prize of 15,000 Rs and professional gaming hardware .Made dynamic strategies and lead the team by coordination and teamwork. I have won several other tournaments but this is the most recent. I have had excellent experiences of working in a team (as a leader/teammate), making real-time decisions and effective communication.

###Personal Details
Date of Birth: 2nd January 1990

Languages Known: English(R/W/S),Hindi(R/W/S) and Marathi(R/W/S).

Location Preferences in India: Mumbai, Pune, Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad
